column5: Surrounded by golf course, this apartment (with 5 pools and 2 hot tubs) is the ultimate relaxing destination. Minutes from Plano, Dallas, Frisco, Grapevine, and Southlake. Easy access to all freeways. Nice bedroom with entrance from the room to your private bathroom , excellent lighting, space and comfort. Great restaurant choices. My place is close to golf course, parks, and the airport. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets).
column8: North Dallas private bed and bath
